column4: sda_; suspend's a sloppy feature of the X11 server. don't expect too much.
so i canot put my computer in powersafe mode i can only turn it off?
I was referring to sleep, but you should be able to "hibernate". And you should be able to do that

Hibernate need almost the same time as turn it on, the only difference is I can keep work as before, but i only need low power for don't wait too much from a session of work and another, i waste 40W anyways if i don't UNPLUG the computer from the electric network so i prefer waste them without turn off my pc and have a very fast "start"
